amendment.description: To provide for the treatment of payments to certain comprehensie cancer centers.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1076 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1076 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S8515-8516; text: CR S8516) To provide for the treatment of payments to certain comprehensie cancer centers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1076 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
